CustomField.description: Returns true if Refused Indicator = False AND Expiration Date > Now() else returns false
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( HealthCloudGA__RefusedIndicator__c = false, DATEVALUE(HealthCloudGA__ExpirationDate__c) > Today()), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns true if Refused Indicator = False AND Expiration Date > Now() else returns false
CustomField.label: IsVisibleOnPatientCard
